overview:
Rok Hrastnik is an international internet marketing management and online retail professional.

Until October 2011 he served as the International Internet Director at Studio Moderna Group, a leading European DRTV & multichannel retailer, building their online retail business practically from scratch to an international team of 150+ people in 22 countries, managing more than 120 webstores.

He also has an entrepreneurial background (US ebook publishing; failed CMS startup in 2003; minor co-founder of Mapyx Ltd. in 2006) and has written “Unleash the Marketing & Publishing Power of RSS” in 2004.

He is a frequent speaker at direct marketing & internet conferences such as DMA Annual, ACCM/RMC, ERA Europe Annual, MarketingSherpa’s Email Summit, Conversion Conference etc.
